name: 迷你健身房
abstract: 玩迷你游戏，强身健体，赚取Fitcoins，建立你的梦想健身房!

detail.app_release_note:
Bugs & improvements:

  * [Tasks] Modified text when you complete all daily or weekly challenges
  * [Tasks] Fixed the achievement of reaching level 5 which was displayed as level 15.
  * [Tasks] Fixed the task of playing all mini-games.
  * [Tasks] Fixed getting the reward for clearing the player's gym
  * [Data] Updated the database and fixed the display of minigame highscores.
  * [Data] Synchronisation between local and database data at the start of the game.
  * [User] Fixed typing your name when you start the game and when you change it from fitwatch
* [Tutorial] Fixed fitcoins image in the tutorial when you go back to Rock's gym after playing your first mini-game.
  * [Audio] Fixed the music button in all gyms
  * [Gym Builder] Fixed currency mismatch when buying in gym builder
  * [Gym Builder] Fixed the item counter in the gym builder
 * [Gym Builder] Fixed lock button translation and functionality
  
And more!!
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
